1245050.name: Fantasy Grounds - Jans Token Pack 13 - Orc Horde
1245050.description:
Jans Token Pack 13 - Orc Horde

Orcs are one of the most iconic fantasy figures, and I love using them in my roleplaying games as villains.
Here is the Orc Horde. A group of diverse Orc characters that are inspired by the game sourcebooks from your favorite fantasy game.
We have simple tribal warriors, dressed in hide and leather. We have heavilly armored Orcs in chainmail and plate armor.
The Orc Mother can defeat her enemies with her claws and magical powers, but she also brings her Cave Bear pet!
The Aurochs, great bison-like creatures can be used as mounts. And the Orcs might also have some less usual members in their ranks such as an Half-Ogre, or a Demonic Warrior.
May these tokens bring you epic battles and a lot of fun!
Converted by:  
Jan Loos
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
